markdownRemark.excerpt: A Spectrum quiet button that’s meant to be placed over a non-standard color. In order to implement this button, you must set the CSS color property of a parent…
markdownRemark.html: A Spectrum quiet button that’s meant to be placed over a non-standard color. In order to implement this button, you must set the CSS color property of a parent element to the same value as the background the button is placed against.
